techmeme.title: A White House document sent to Capitol Hill shows President Trump plans to nominate Brian Quintenz, a16z Crypto's head of policy, to lead the CFTC (Bloomberg)

Miami-based Moderne, which helps companies analyze their software stack and remediate technical debt, raised a $30M Series B led by Acrew Capital (Paul Sawers/TechCrunch)
Meta creates a free, "fully funded" curriculum to teach middle schoolers how to recognize forms of online exploitation, in partnership with nonprofit Childhelp (Emma Roth/The Verge)
A look at ACTS 17, a nonprofit devoted to introducing Christianity to technologists by inviting Peter Thiel and other tech executives to talk about their faith (Emma Goldberg/New York Times)
